About

I’m a graphic and web designer from Montreal, Canada. My design philosophy combines simplicity with a high level of polish and personality. I’m a designer with front-end web developer chops. I take great satisfaction from creating products that look amazing and get results.

Currently a designer at Foodtastic.

Also available for freelance work.

Brief History

My interest in graphic design, animation and coding began as a teenager. Since the beggining I have been interested in art and technology, which pulled me into this field. I studied graphic and web design at John Abbott College (graduating on the dean’s list) and began taking on my first small freelance projects on the side. After graduation I started working full time as an in-house graphic designer at restaurant franchising company Foodtastic, where I had the opportunity to work with a wide variety of different brand and marketing campaigns. Using design solutions for packaging, print and web design I create compelling visuals with the goal of increasing brand recognition and boosting sales and conversions.

I now have over 5 years of combined experience working and studying in the graphic and web design field, and am continuing to grow experience my skillset.
